author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Implements new internal dashboards for tracking daily infrastructure spending, platform load, and revenue metrics.
gist.impact: Enables better visibility into system performance and financial sustainability for the operations team.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot studying glowing monitors with pixelated charts and graphs in a control room filled with potted plants. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes. Nostalgic but beautiful.
